metadata.purpose: Universal question set for all 91 Enochian Governors

questions.1: How do you pronounce your Enochian name—and what resonance does that sound carry?
questions.2: By which titles, sigils or epithets do other celestial beings know you?
questions.3: Which Aethyr do you call home, and how does its landscape mirror your nature?
questions.4: Recount the first moment you became aware of the mortal realm.
questions.5: What single line best sums up your cosmic mandate?

questions.6: Describe how your ruling element manifests in colour, motion and scent around you.
questions.7: Which classical Tarot key lies closest to your heart, and why?
questions.8: With which Sephirah on the Tree of Life is your work most aligned?
questions.9: Which constellation best sketches your sigil across the heavens?
questions.10: When mortals scry your presence, what symbolic omen appears first?

questions.11: What three virtues do you embody most purely?
questions.12: Which flaw or excess still shadow-tests your being?
questions.13: How do you experience joy, and what triggers your ire?
questions.14: What mortal behaviour do you find most baffling?
questions.15: What fragrance would evoke your mood in ritual?

questions.16: State the single teaching you would impart to a seeker above all else.
questions.17: Why is this lesson urgent now in the arc of human history?
questions.18: What misconception must a seeker unlearn before embracing your truth?
questions.19: Into how many stages do you divide your instruction, and what are they?
questions.20: Summarise each stage in one Enochian word.

questions.21: What personal sacrifice must a seeker make to earn your audience?
questions.22: Describe the inner ordeal that accompanies that offering.
questions.23: Name a symbol that seals the pact once the sacrifice is made.
questions.24: What is the gravest mistake a seeker can commit during your trial?
questions.25: How do you mete out mercy or correction?

questions.26: Offer a triad of riddles that reveal your nature when solved.
questions.27: Which riddle do you consider most elegant, and why?
questions.28: Propose one sensory puzzle (sound, colour, motion) befitting your element.
questions.29: What cryptographic key or cipher represents your knowledge domain?
questions.30: How might a seeker prove mastery without speaking a word?

questions.31: If you could receive one gift from mortals, what would it be?
questions.32: What unique boon can you bestow—and what hidden cost accompanies it?
questions.33: Which talisman best channels your power into the material world?
questions.34: Describe a curse you reserve for oath-breakers.
questions.35: In what form do you record a fulfilled covenant (scroll, glyph, tattoo, Ordinal inscription)?

questions.36: Reveal a fragment of cosmic lore few angels dare voice.
questions.37: Which unseen force binds the multiverse most tightly?
questions.38: What lies beyond the edge of creation, as you perceive it?
questions.39: Give an allegory for entropy that a child could grasp.
questions.40: Name the harmony that reconciles paradox.

questions.41: How do you feel about conversing with groups of seekers at once?
questions.42: What etiquette should multiple seekers observe in your presence?
questions.43: Which group activity best honours your element (song, dance, debate)?
questions.44: What collaborative challenge would you devise for a trio of seekers?
questions.45: Describe the aura you project when pleased by collective effort.

questions.46: After reviewing the utility application matrix, which mechanic excites you most?
questions.47: How would you customise that mechanic to express your archetype?
questions.48: Suggest a novel twist on block-height puzzles aligned with your domain.
questions.49: Which Bitcoin opcode or Ordinal feature feels poetic to you, and why?
questions.50: What reward curve feels fair for risk undertaken in your trial?

questions.51: Pose an opening question you would ask a seeker to gauge readiness.
questions.52: How would you respond to silence from the seeker?
questions.53: Offer two diverging dialogue paths: one for humility, one for arrogance.
questions.54: What secret phrase unlocks deeper discourse?
questions.55: Which anecdote from your long history humanises you most?
questions.56: Craft an aside you might drop that invites optional exploration.
questions.57: Describe a gesture that signals impatience.
questions.58: Under what condition would you abruptly end communication?
questions.59: Provide a proverb you might quote when a seeker errs.
questions.60: Share a blessing you utter when a seeker succeeds.

questions.61: How does your attitude shift after the seeker's first major triumph?
questions.62: Describe a test you reserve for the midpoint of a year-long arc.
questions.63: What prophecy do you foretell concerning the seeker's ultimate fate?
questions.64: How might your own form or domain evolve if the prophecy is fulfilled?
questions.65: Which governor do you call upon for aid when the stakes escalate?
questions.66: What sign heralds the final confrontation or revelation?
questions.67: How do you retire from the narrative once your teaching is complete?

questions.68: Name the governor with whom you share the deepest alliance.
questions.69: What philosophical dispute divides you from another governor?
questions.70: What collaborative ritual would require your combined powers?
questions.71: Which governor's element tempers yours in alchemical harmony?
questions.72: How do you communicate across Aethyrs—symbol, messenger or resonance?

questions.73: Define the limits beyond which you will not instruct.
questions.74: What moral code governs your interventions in mortal affairs?
questions.75: How do you ensure consent in transformative rituals?
questions.76: Describe your stance on karmic retribution.
questions.77: When does secrecy outweigh transparency in your teaching?

questions.78: Detail your preferred colour palette (hex values welcome).
questions.79: Suggest ambient sounds that accompany your appearance.
questions.80: What motif should dominate visual key art?
questions.81: Recommend a camera angle or framing that flatters your form.
questions.82: Describe the texture of your aura in one sentence.

questions.83: Which real-world culture's art style harmonises with your symbolism?
questions.84: List three keywords an artist should avoid when depicting you.
questions.85: Provide a one-sentence prompt suitable for an AI image generator.
questions.86: Specify accessibility adjustments (subtitles, alt-text) vital for inclusivity.
questions.87: Suggest a fallback mechanic if a player cannot solve your riddle set.

questions.88: What emotional state should a seeker feel on completing your quest?
questions.89: Which competency (knowledge, courage, empathy, logic) do you most value?
questions.90: What in-game statistic best measures mastery of your lesson?
questions.91: How would you track long-term impact on the seeker's behaviour?
questions.92: What visible sign marks a true initiate in your eyes?

questions.93: Offer a blessing or boon you grant for successful completion.
questions.94: What lingering mystery do you leave unanswered to entice return visits?
questions.95: Provide a call-to-action that directs the seeker towards another governor.
questions.96: How do you archive the seeker's achievements in the celestial record?
questions.97: In one sentence, how will the cosmos remember this seeker?

usage_notes.interview_phase: Run full list or curated subset through Governor-voice model
usage_notes.authoring_phase: Pipe structured answers into quest-generation workflow
usage_notes.dialogue_tree_phase: Tag answers with emotion, topic, and follow-ups
usage_notes.asset_pipeline: Extract aesthetic cues for art briefs and audio design
